entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle near noon. Showers beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
